ARABIC: إِنَّا نَطْمَعُ أَن يَغْفِرَ لَنَا رَبُّنَا خَطَٰيَٰنَآ أَن كُنَّآ أَوَّلَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: We remain hopeful that our Lord will forgive us our mistakes for being the first of the muminun.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: We certainly hope our Lord will forgive our sins as we are the first to believe."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and we surely expect that Our Lord will forgive us our sins for we are the first ones to believe."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They said, "It does not matter. We shall be returning to our Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “We hope that our Lord will forgive us our mistakes, as we are the first to believe.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Verily, we really hope that our Lord will forgive us our sins, as we are the first of the believers."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Surely we hope that our Lord will forgive us our wrongs because we are the first of the believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: We are eager that our Lord should forgive us our offences, for that we are the first of the believers.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lo! we ardently hope that our Lord will forgive us our sins because we are the first of the believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: We hope our Lord will forgive us, as we are the first of the believers."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily we long that our Lord shall forgive us our faults because we have been the first of the believers
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Indeed we hope our Lord will forgive us our offences for being the first to believe.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Only, our desire is that our Lord will forgive us our faults, that we may become foremost among the believers!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Verily! We really hope that our Lord will forgive us our sins, as we are the first of the believers [in Musa (Moses) and in the Monotheism which he has brought from Allah]."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: We are eager that Our Lord should forgive us our offenses, for we are the first of the believers'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: We are eager for our Lord to forgive us our sins, since we are the first of the believers.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed, we aspire that our Lord will forgive us our sins because we were the first of the believers."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [26:51] Indeed We hope our Lord will forgive us our iniquities, for being the first to believe’, in our time.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Lo! we ardently hope that our Lord will forgive us our sins) our idolatry (because we are the first of the believers) in Moses.
